content:
Getting this error on our login page:

Failed to download metadata from /Shibboleth.sso/DiscoFeed.

Go here: https://dataverse.lib.virginia.edu/
and click "Log In"

Figured it out.....
Our AWS "box" was "yum updated and rebooted Saturday morning"

But shibd was not running....It is now and all is well.
Sherry Lake has marked this topic as resolved.
